homepage_hope: xxxx We hope you can make it!
homepage_details: xxxx We've made plans for a Malaysian and UK celebration:
homepage_paypal_message: xxxxYour presence is already the perfect gift for us. We do have a honeyfund for anyone who wants to give us a wedding gift.
homepage_paypal_message2: xxxTap this PayPal button to contribute:
homepage_paypal_page_note: xxx Thanks for contributing to Tim and Carmen's wedding 'Honeyfund' - we'll be putting it towards our 2025 honeymoon!
uk_modal_bristol_register_p: We'll be registering our marriage in the center of the city. Everyone is welcome to join.
uk_modal_bristol_reception_p: We've booked the *venue tbc* for drinks, food, speeches and to celebrate with you all.
